alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 22 at 3:46AM MST until February 23 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to around 50 mph expected. Localized gusts over 55 mph possible near Farmington Canyon. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 7 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds can be expected near canyons, especially Farmington, Weber, and Logan Canyons. Winds may not be as strong elsewhere.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front
